Small Groups

Most of InterVarsity’s ministry happens in our small groups as they work together to fulfill the Great Commission of Jesus Christ on our campus. Each group has one mission: to love God and to love others. This is done by following the example of the fellowship of Jesus’ apostles, seeking to edify each other through prayer, worship, and Scripture as we invite our community to join us in partaking in God's love for us.

Foundations Group

A group for seekers, skeptics, and new Christians. Come explore what the Bible is about!
